title: Global basketball shoe sales 2012 - 2013 , by NBA player
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Quarters for 2 groups 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, similar trend was observed for 2012 and Quarter. In both cases, the SOME LABEL have lowered.
In Quarter Michael Jordan, 2013 had the highest SOME LABEL 2500.0 among the 2 groups and in Kevin Durant, 2012 had the lowest SOME LABEL 35.0.
In Quarter Michael Jordan, 2012 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Quarter Kevin Durant out of all 5 Quarters.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Quarters for 2 groups 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
Over the 5 Quarters, the SOME LABEL for both 2012 and Quarter have lowered.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Quarters for 2 groups 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, similar trend was observed for 2012 and Quarter. In both cases, the SOME LABEL have lowered.
In Quarter Michael Jordan, 2013 had the highest SOME LABEL 2500.0 among the 2 groups and in Kevin Durant, 2012 had the lowest SOME LABEL 35.0.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Quarters for 2 groups 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, similar trend was observed for 2012 and Quarter. In both cases, the SOME LABEL have lowered.
In Quarter Michael Jordan, 2013 had the highest SOME LABEL 2500.0 among the 2 groups and in Kevin Durant, 2012 had the lowest SOME LABEL 35.0.
Among all the Quarters, 2012 had the highest SOME LABEL 2000.0 in Quarter Michael Jordan and lowest value 35.0 in Quarter Kevin Durant.
Quarter Michael Jordan and Kevin Durant had the biggest gap of 1965.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2012.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of 2012.
On average, the Quarter Michael Jordan had the highest SOME LABEL for all 2 groups 2012, and 2013. Whereas Derrick Rose had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
